name: Magazine Printing
tagline: Premium magazine printing for publishers who demand the best.
description: From independent literary journals to high-gloss consumer magazines, we print with the quality your readers expect. Perfect binding, saddle stitch, UV coated covers, and more.

items.label: Premium Interior
items.value: 100 lb gloss or silk for photography

process.title: File Submission
process.desc: Submit your print-ready PDF with proper bleeds and color profiles.

process.title: Cover Proof
process.desc: We provide a cover proof for approval before going to press.

process.title: Interior Production
process.desc: Interior pages printed and ready for binding.

process.title: Cover Finishing
process.desc: Lamination or UV coating applied to covers.

process.title: Binding & Delivery
process.desc: Bound, quality checked, and shipped to your address or distributor.

faq.q: What is the minimum page count for perfect binding?
faq.a: Perfect binding requires a minimum of 48 pages to create a readable spine.

faq.q: Can I have a different paper for cover vs interior?
faq.a: Yes. We recommend heavier cover stock (80–100 lb) with lighter interior (60–80 lb).

faq.q: Do you offer UV coating on covers?
faq.a: Yes. Gloss UV, matte laminate, soft touch, and spot UV are all available for covers.

faq.q: What turnaround should I expect for 1,000 magazines?
faq.a: Standard turnaround for 1,000 magazines is 7–10 business days from approved proof.

faq.q: Can you match Pantone colors for my brand?
faq.a: Yes, Pantone matching is available for covers and spot color elements.
